message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
Your 60-40 split seems a bit unfair to me. How about we meet in the middle at 55-45?
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
This is a tough negotiation, Alice! I'm willing to be flexible, but the value is dropping fast. How about 52-48?
Come on Bob, 57-43 and we're done. Inflation is killing me!
